          <title>
            <string language="sl">Vodovod, kanalizacija, centralna kurjava</string>
            <string language="en">Waterworks, sewage system, central heating</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Waterworks, Abwassersystem, Zentralheizung</string>

          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Kako delujejo hišne inštalacije - vodovod, kanalizacija in centralna kurjava? Slike, animacije. Pozor: 5,83 Mb</string>
            <string language="en">Presentation of typical house installations and pipes (waterworks, sewage system, heating system, ...).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vodovod</string>
            <string language="en">waterworks</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="sl">omrežje</string>

          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellung der typischen Hausinstallationen und

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présentation des installations de maison et des

chauffage...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apresentação de instalações da casa e das

heating...).</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-it">Presentazione delle installazioni della casa e

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρουσίαση των χαρακτηριστικών εγκαταστάσεων σπιτιών 
και σωλήνες (υδάτινα έργα, σύστημα λυμάτων, σύστημα 
θέρμανσης...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presentación de las instalaciones y de los tubos
típicos (waterworks, sistema de las aguas residuales, sistema de la 
casa de calefacción...).</string>
          </description>
